metadata.topic: Topic 5: Fossil fuels and Carbon Compounds

topics: Topic 5: Fossil fuels and Carbon Compounds
questions.question:
What are the advantages of using natural gas over using coal as a fuel in power stations?
	(1) In comparing with coal, natural gas burns more completely
	(2) In comparing with coal, natural gas has less sulphur-containing substances
	(3) Natural gas is a renewable energy source, but coal is not
